verses.text: \w If|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* rise \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* midst \w of|strong="H1697"\w* thee \w a|strong="H4480"\w* prophet \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* saith \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath dreamed \w a|strong="H4480"\w* dream, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* foretell \w a|strong="H4480"\w* sign \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* wonder,

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w come|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w pass|strong="H6965"\w* \w which|strong="H0226"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w spoke|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w say|strong="H0176"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee: \w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w go|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* follow strange gods, \w which|strong="H0226"\w* thou knowest \w not|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* serve \w them|strong="H0413"\w*:

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hear \w the|strong="H0559"\w* words \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w prophet|strong="H1696"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* dreamer: \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Lord \w your|strong="H0834"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* trieth \w you|strong="H0834"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* appear whether \w you|strong="H0834"\w* love \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w your|strong="H0834"\w* heart, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w your|strong="H0834"\w* soul, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Follow|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fear \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w commandments|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* voice: \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* serve, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* cleave.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w prophet|strong="H0430"\w* \w or|strong="H8085"\w* forger \w of|strong="H0430"\w* dreams \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* slain: \w because|strong="H0310"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* spoke \w to|strong="H3068"\w* draw \w you|strong="H0853"\w* \w away|strong="H0310"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* brought \w you|strong="H0853"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* land \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Egypt, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* redeemed \w you|strong="H0853"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* house \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w bondage|strong="H5647"\w*: \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H8085"\w* thee go \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* way, which \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w commanded|strong="H4687"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w take|strong="H8104"\w* \w away|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* evil \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* midst \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thee.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* thy brother \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy mother, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* thy son, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1004"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* thy \w wife|strong="H1696"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy bosom, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* thy friend, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thou lovest \w as|strong="H0834"\w* thy own soul, \w would|strong="H3068"\w* persuade thee secretly, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*: Let \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* serve strange \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou knowest \w not|strong="H3588"\w*, \w nor|strong="H4480"\w* thy fathers,

\w Of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* nations round \w about|strong="H3045"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w near|strong="H3808"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* afar \w off|strong="H7453"\w*, \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* end \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* earth \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w*,

Consent \w not|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, hear \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w not|strong="H0776"\w*, neither let thy eye spare \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* pity \w and|strong="H0430"\w* conceal \w him|strong="H0413"\w*,

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* thou shalt presently put \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* death. \w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w Let|strong="H3808"\w* thy hand \w be|strong="H3808"\w* first \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* afterwards \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hands \w of|strong="H5869"\w* all \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w With|strong="H3027"\w* stones \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* stoned \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* withdrawn thee \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord thy \w God|strong="H3027"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* thee \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Egypt, \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* house \w of|strong="H3027"\w* bondage:

\w That|strong="H3588"\w* all Israel hearing \w may|strong="H0776"\w* fear, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w do|strong="H3318"\w* no \w more|strong="H5921"\w* \w any|strong="H3318"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* \w like|strong="H0776"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w*.

If \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* thy cities, \w which|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord thy \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w give|strong="H3254"\w* thee \w to|strong="H3478"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H3478"\w*, thou \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w some|strong="H3605"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w*:

Children \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Belial \w are|strong="H0834"\w* gone \w out|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* midst \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* withdrawn \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* go, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* serve strange \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* know \w not|strong="H3588"\w*:

Inquire \w carefully|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* diligently, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* truth \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* thing \w by|strong="H3427"\w* looking \w well|strong="H3045"\w* \w into|strong="H0376"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H0834"\w* thou \w find|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w certain|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w* abomination hath \w been|strong="H0834"\w* \w really|strong="H0559"\w* committed,

Thou shalt forthwith kill \w the|strong="H1875"\w* inhabitants \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* city \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1875"\w* edge \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H1875"\w* sword, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* shalt \w destroy|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H3559"\w* \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w all|strong="H1697"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w it|strong="H3559"\w*, \w even|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H1875"\w* cattle.

\w And|strong="H2719"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* household goods \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H3427"\w*, thou shalt gather together \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* streets thereof, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* shalt burn \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w itself|strong="H1931"\w*, \w so|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H6310"\w* consume \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord thy God, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* heap \w for|strong="H3605"\w* ever: \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H0929"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* built \w no|strong="H3605"\w* more.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* anathema stick \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy hand: \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w turn|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wrath \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* fury, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* multiply thee \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* swore \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy fathers,

\w When|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt hear \w the|strong="H0834"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w keeping|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* precepts, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w command|strong="H3027"\w* thee \w this|strong="H0834"\w* day, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou mayst \w do|strong="H3027"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* pleasing \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* sight \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.
